allow:
Bash(python -c "
import sqlite3
conn = sqlite3.connect(''portfolio.db'')
cursor = conn.cursor()

cursor.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM portfolio_snapshots'')
snapshots = cursor.fetchone()[0]

cursor.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM activity_log'')
logs = cursor.fetchone()[0]

cursor.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trades'')
trades = cursor.fetchone()[0]

cursor.execute(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sold_positions'')
sold = cursor.fetchone()[0]

print(''Database Status:'')
print(f''  Snapshots: {snapshots}'')
print(f''  Activity Logs: {logs}'')
print(f''  Trades: {trades}'')
print(f''  Sold Positions: {sold}'')
print()
if snapshots == 0 and logs == 0 and trades == 0 and sold == 0:
    print(''OK - Database is clean and ready for production'')
else:
    print(''WARNING - Database has data!'')

conn.close()
")
